t: Check out this Amazon review of NatureZap for the garden
s: I own the NatureZap and use it for my gardens, not lawn. It works well in controlling the weeds within the mulch. Easy to use and the instructions are right there on the handle. You do have to be careful to position the "knife" into the weed.
